title.rendered: Heat Meters Market to Reach $2.7 Billion, Globally, by 2032 at 5.4% CAGR: Allied Market Research

content.rendered:
The global heat meters market is experiencing growth driven by factors such as escalating emphasis on environmentally conscious, cost savings, and billing accuracy. As industries persist on prioritizing sustainable practices, the heat meters market is expected to have a sustainable expansion, aligning with the shifting inclinations of consumers seeking environmentally friendly and better management of energy consumption.

Portland, Jan. 22, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Allied Market Research published a report, titled, “Heat Meters Market by Type (Mechanical, Static), Connectivity (Wireless, Wired), Application (Residential, Commercial, Industrial): Global Opportunity Analysis and Industry Forecast, 2023-2032”. According to the report, the global heat meters market was valued at $1.6 billion in 2022, and is projected to reach $2.7 billion by 2032, registering a CAGR of 5.4% from 2023 to 2032.

Download PDF Brochure: https://www.alliedmarketresearch.com/request-sample/7355

Prime determinants of growth

The global heat meters market is experiencing growth due to several factors such as increase in adoption of district heating systems and rise in demand for energy efficiency. However, high initial cost of investment restricts potential users from investing in heat meters, which hinders the market growth. Moreover, integration with smart technologies enables remote monitoring and control of heat meters. Smart technologies offer scalability and adaptability, allowing for easy integration of heat meters into evolving energy management systems. As technology advances, these systems accommodate additional sensors, analytics tools, or functionalities, ensuring compatibility with future smart grid developments or emerging energy-saving solutions and offers remunerative opportunities for the expansion of the heat meters market.

Report coverage & details:

Report Coverage Details
Forecast Period 2023–2032
Base Year 2022
Market Size in 2022 $1.6 billion
Market Size in 2032 $2.7 billion
CAGR 5.4%
No. of Pages in Report 250
Segments Covered Type, Connectivity, Application, and Region.
Drivers
  • Increase in adoption of district heating system
  • Rise in demand for energy efficiency
Opportunity
  • Integration with smart technologies
Restraint

Static segment maintains its dominance by 2032

By type, the static segment held the highest market share in 2022, accounting for nearly three-fourths of the global heat meters market revenue and is estimated to maintain its leadership status during the forecast period. Static heat meters are known for their accuracy and stability in measuring thermal energy, making them suitable for a wide range of applications such as district heating, individual apartment heating, and industrial processes. Their reliability in providing precise measurements contributes to efficient energy management and supports efforts toward sustainability by promoting responsible energy consumption. Moreover, static heat meters utilize advanced measurement technology, often employing ultrasonic or electromagnetic sensors. These sensors offer high precision in capturing heat consumption data, ensuring accurate measurements even in varying flow rates and temperatures. The reliability of static meters provides an opportunity for more transparent and fair billing based on actual energy usage. Thus, creating new growth opportunities for the static heat meters.

Procure Complete Report (250 Pages PDF with Insights, Charts, Tables, and Figures) @

https://www.alliedmarketresearch.com/checkout-final/heat-meters-market

The wired segment is expected to lead the trail by 2032

By connectivity, the wired segment held the highest market share in 2022, accounting for less than two-thirds of the global heat meters market revenue and is estimated to dominate the market during the forecast period. As global initiatives emphasize energy efficiency and sustainability, wired heat meters are being deployed to optimize energy usage. They play a crucial role in identifying inefficiencies in heating systems, enabling consumers and businesses to make informed decisions to reduce energy consumption and carbon footprint. The accurate data provided by wired meters assists in implementing targeted strategies for energy conservation and sustainability goals. In addition, wired heat meters continue to maintain a strong market presence due to their proven reliability and accuracy in data transmission. In sectors where precision is crucial, such as industrial applications or billing in residential spaces, the dependability of wired connections remains a primary factor. All these factors are expected to increase the demand for the wired heat meter during the forecast period.

The residential segment maintains its dominance by 2032

By application, the residential segment held the highest market share in 2022, accounting for less than half of the global heat meters market revenue and is estimated to dominate the market during the forecast period. In residential complexes or multi-family dwellings, individual heat meters allow for accurate measurement of energy consumption in each unit. This enables fair and transparent billing, ensuring that residents only pay for the energy they use. It promotes a sense of fairness among occupants and encourages energy-conscious behaviors, leading to reduced waste and more efficient use of resources. In addition, heat meters offer residents valuable insights into their heating consumption patterns. All these factors increase the demand for the heat meter in residential applications.

Asia-Pacific is expected to grow faster throughout the forecast period

Region-wise, Asia-Pacific is the fastest growing region in terms of revenue in 2022 with a 5.9% CAGR. Rapid urbanization and industrialization in Asia-Pacific countries have led to heightened energy consumption. Heat meters offer an opportunity to monitor and manage energy usage more effectively, especially in densely populated urban areas. With a growing emphasis on energy efficiency and conservation, there is rise in demand for technologies such as heat meters that enable precise measurement and control of thermal energy consumption in residential, commercial, and industrial sectors.

For Purchase Inquiry: https://www.alliedmarketresearch.com/heat-meters-market/purchase-options

Leading Market Players:-

  • DANFOSS A/S
  • DIEHL STIFTUNG & CO. KG
  • HONEYWELL INTERNATIONAL INC.
  • ISTA ENERGY SOLUTIONS LIMITED
  • KAMSTRUP
  • LANDIS+GYR GROUP AG
  • QUNDIS
  • SENSUS
  • SIEMENS AG
  • SONTEX SA

The report provides a detailed analysis of these key players in the global heat meters market. These players have adopted different strategies such as new product launches, collaborations, expansion, joint ventures, agreements, and others to increase their market share and maintain dominant shares in different regions. The report is valuable in highlighting business performance, operating segments, product portfolio, and strategic moves of market players to showcase the competitive scenario.

Ultrasonic Flowmeter Market: Opportunity Analysis, and Industry Forecast, 2021–2028

Power Metering Market: Global Opportunity Analysis and Industry Forecast, 2023-2032

About us:

Allied Market Research (AMR) is a full-service market research and business-consulting wing of Allied Analytics LLP based in Wilmington, Delaware. Allied Market Research provides global enterprises as well as medium and small businesses with unmatched quality of “Market Research Reports” and “Business Intelligence Solutions.” AMR has a targeted view to provide business insights and consulting to assist its clients to make strategic business decisions and achieve sustainable growth in their respective market domain.

We are in professional corporate relations with various companies and this helps us in digging out market data that helps us generate accurate research data tables and confirms utmost accuracy in our market forecasting. Allied Market Research CEO Pawan Kumar is instrumental in inspiring and encouraging everyone associated with the company to maintain high quality of data and help clients in every way possible to achieve success. Each and every data presented in the reports published by us is extracted through primary interviews with top officials from leading companies of domain concerned. Our secondary data procurement methodology includes deep online and offline research and discussion with knowledgeable professionals and analysts in the industry.
